pr_title: DROOLS-5017: [DMN Designer] Validation issues are not shown in Alerts panel

timeline.message: DROOLS-5017: [DMN Designer] Validation issues are not shown in Alerts panel

timeline.bodyText:
Javadoc of noneMatch
Returns whether no elements of this stream match the provided predicate. May not evaluate the predicate on all elements if not necessary for determining the result. If the stream is empty then true is returned and the predicate is not evaluated.

Due to above I think we can simplify as
        final boolean valid = violationsList
                .stream()
                .noneMatch(v -> applyViolation(canvasHandler, v));
WDYT?
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Updated in new commit (and removed old comment about use of anyMatch(..)).
